titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of General Services to construct a Federal building at 125th Street and Lenox Avenue in the city of New York, New York.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.
Executive Comment Requested from GSA, OMB.

bill.summary: 5/27/1987--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of General Services to construct a Federal building on the northwestern corner of 125th Street and Lenox Avenue in New York, New York.
